mapper.insert: insert into module (id, module_name, module_url, is_menu, parent_menu_id, module_order, module_icon, del_flg, version, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{moduleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{moduleUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isMenu,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{parentMenuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{moduleOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{moduleIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlg,jdbcType=BIT}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: update module set module_name = #{moduleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, module_url = #{moduleUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_menu = #{isMenu,jdbcType=CHAR}, parent_menu_id = #{parentMenuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, module_order = #{moduleOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, module_icon = #{moduleIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flg = #{delFlg,jdbcType=BIT}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, update_id = #{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, module_name, module_url, is_menu, parent_menu_id, module_order, module_icon, del_flg, version, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time from module where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
